io.micronaut.security.token.refresh

Interface RefreshTokenPersistence

  • All Superinterfaces:
    io.micronaut.context.event.ApplicationEventListener<RefreshTokenGeneratedEvent>, java.util.EventListener

    public interface RefreshTokenPersistence
extends io.micronaut.context.event.ApplicationEventListener<RefreshTokenGeneratedEvent>
    Responsible for persisting refresh tokens and retrieving user details by a refresh token.
    Since:
    2.0.0
    Author:
    James Kleeh
